nodes.text: Murdok was a male Weequay beast handler living during the Galactic War. In 3639 BBY he joined the Warstalkers military company on Denova after the Warstalker leader Kephess fell under the influence of the Dread Masters. Commanding two large Drouk's, Toth and Zorn, Murdok was trying to stop an enemy force from reaching Kephess's Redoubt, but failed and was killed shortly after his beasts.
Handler Murdok appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as a boss during the "Explosive Conflict" operation.
